response.overview: In the longing to recover her few memories of Carlos, her late father, Paulette embarks on a journey to her former home, in the north of Chile. She travels through different cities that were part of her father's short life and her childhood. At each stop, she meets with family members who reveal to her the sour past and the questions that torment her inner child.
response.tagline: I'm not afraid of the sea anymore, but ...
response.title: Lágrimas de sal
